column4: Hi there, it seems Ubuntu can't play sound from two different apps at the same time. Like I can't view a YouTube video while having my music player going. Is there a fix to this?
kinetic_being last I was told it's a flash bug
Googling seems to be the case yes

kinetic_being , have you guys tried this? http://ubuntuforums.org/showpost.php?p=5587712&postcount=472    i had the problem since... well, since updating to 8.04, but i havent seen this page until today. also, the problem seems to come and go O_o
